name: test_add_missing_fields
description: Test attachment upload without required fields returns 400
descriptionHtml: Test attachment upload without required fields returns 400
statusMessage: AssertionError: Expected status 400, got 401. URL: https://api.ganttpro.com/v1.0/attachments, Response: { "statusCode": 401, "message": "Access denied due to invalid subscription key. Make sure to provide a valid key for an active subscription." }
statusTrace:
tests/endpoints/attachments/test_attachments_add.py:69: in test_add_missing_fields
    assert_status_code(response, 400)
src/assertions.py:28: in assert_status_code
    assert response.status_code == expected_status, message
